Description:
<zh-CN>
真无线降噪耳机
</zh-CN>
<en-US>
True Wireless Noise Cancellation In-Ear Headphones
</en-US>
Name: W240TN
ProductDesc:
<zh-CN>
双动圈同轴单元，声场宽广，享受沉浸式聆听；
ANC主动降噪技术，静享安逸世界；
支持环境声监听，安全出行更放心；
蓝牙V5.3技术，传输更稳距离更远； 
深度神经网络AI通话降噪技术，清晰通话；
ANC模式下7小时持久续航, 随行随充；
物理按键设计，轻松操控，精准控制； 
开启游戏模式，即可同步游戏体验；
IP55级防尘防水，无惧雨水汗水；
支持APP操作，更多个性设置尽在Edifier Connect。
</zh-CN>
<en-US>
Coaxial dual-dynamic drivers create a wide sound field and immersive listening feeling
Active noise cancellation with ambient sound mode
Advanced Bluetooth V5.3
AI DNN noise cancellation for crystal clear calls
Long lasting battery life with almost 7 hours playback per charge(ANC ON)
Physical button design for easy and precise control 
Synchronized gaming experience with game mode on
IP55 dust and water resistant
Customized settings via Edifier Connect App
</en-US>

Description:
<zh-CN>
覆耳式无线降噪耳机
</zh-CN>
<en-US>
Wireless Noise Cancellation Over-Ear Headphones
</en-US>
Name: WH700NB
ProductDesc:
<zh-CN>
采用主动降噪技术，聆臻音静随心
耳机双设备连接，使用方便快捷
AI通话降噪，清晰通话犹如面谈 
支持环境声监听，重要信息不再错过

70小时持久续航摆脱电量焦虑
金属头梁持久耐用，可折叠收纳方便
</zh-CN>
<en-US>
Active noise cancellation, get the world quiet in a second
Dual-device connection, switch between devices smoothly
AI environmental noise cancellation, crystal clear as a face-to face talk  
Low latency game mode, the trick to victory
Ambient sound mode, no more key information missing out
70 hours ultra-long battery life, freeing you from battery anxiety
Metal and foldable design for durable and convenient storage
</en-US>

Name: WH950NB
ProductDesc:
<zh-CN>
主动降噪及环境声模式能因应各种环境需求
音质保证来自LDAC音频解码加上Hi-Res Audio Wireless认证
进阶的4麦ENC通话，给予近在咫尺的通话体验
透过Edifier Connect App选择不同的音乐模式及自定义专属的EQ
对于安卓用户支援Google快速配对
充满电1.5小时，在降噪模式下可享受34个小时不间断的音乐时间（关闭降噪：55个小时）
支持快速充电：充10分钟就有7小时使用时间
40mm复合振膜式喇叭单元
听力双重防护：音量＜85dB和自动关机设置
方便折叠的设计，是职场会议出门旅游跟日常使用的最佳伙伴
</zh-CN>
<en-US>
Active Noise Cancellation + Ambient Sound selection
LDAC codec with Hi-Res Audio Wireless certification
Advanced 4-Mic ENC for the best voice clarity
Personalize EQ and select various music modes in Edifier Connect APP
Supports Google Fast Pair for Android users 1.5hrs fully charged for at least 34hrs playtime(ANC ON) / 55hrs(ANC OFF)
Fast charging: 7hrs playback in just 10mins 
40mm dynamic driver
Double protection for safe hearing: Volume <85dB and a cut-off timer
Foldable and lightweight design. Ideal for daily use, conference meeting and travel
</en-US>

Name: WH500
ProductDesc:
<zh-CN>
透过Edifier Connect App选择不同的音乐模式及自定义专属的EQ
充满电2小时，即可享受46个小时不间断的音乐时间
支持快速充电：充10分钟就有8.5小时使用时间
30mm复合振膜式喇叭单元 
听力双重防护：音量＜85dB和自动关机设置
方便折叠又轻盈小巧的设计，是出门旅游跟日常使用的最佳伙伴
多款时尚配色选择，让它成为你品味风格的一部分
</zh-CN>
<en-US>
Personalize EQ and select various music modes in Edifier Connect APP.
2hrs fully charged for 40hrs music playtime.
Fast charging: 3hrs playback in just 15mins.
30mm dynamic driver
Safe volume setting to limit the volume below 85dB.
Foldable and lightweight design. Ideal for daily use and travel.
Trendy color options for user to match their style.
</en-US>

Description:
<zh-CN>
立体声蓝牙耳机
</zh-CN>
<en-US>
Bluetooth Stereo Headphones
</en-US>
Name: W800BT Plus
ProductDesc:
<zh-CN>
升级高通QCC3024芯片方案
QualcommaptX高清音频编解码
大尺寸钕铁硼强磁单元，声场强大
高通cVc8.0通话环境降噪算法
支持一拖二，可连接两个蓝牙设备使用
下载EDIFIER CONNECT，解锁更多功能
</zh-CN>
<en-US>
Newly upgraded Qualcomm chipset with Bluetooth V5.1
Qualcomm aptX TM for high-definition audio
Φ40mm NdFeB driver delivers punchy bass
Built-in microphone
Qualcomm cVc TM 8.0 noise cancellation
Support connecting between two Bluetooth devices simultaneously
Support EDIFIER CONNECT APP
</en-US>
